document.masterDocTitle: To the knowledge of cuckoo wasps (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae) of the Balearic Archipelago, Spain

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: To the knowledge of cuckoo wasps (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae) of the Balearic Archipelago, Spain

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Balearic Islands: Mallorca: Palma (Linsenmaier 1968 : 66 )
Distribution. Spain , Balearic Islands (Mingo 1994 ); North Africa (Linsenmaier 1997 ).
Distribution. Balearic Islands: Mallorca (Linsenmaier 1959 )

Note . The synonymy of this species with
Chrysis calviensis Kusdas 1974
is possible.
Distribution. Spain , France , Italy . Balearic Islands (Linsenmaier 1968 ).

Distribution. Widespread in Palearctic Region. Balearic Islands: Menorca (Ciudadela). Fenology.
1 .VI
, 1 ex.

Chrysis lanceolata Linsenmaier 1959 : 121
; 1968 : 72 .
Distribution. Spain , Portugal , Italy , Greece , Turkey . Balearic Islands Malloca (Bunyola).

Remarks .
Chrysis lanceolata
is considered a Western South European and Anatolian species, that moved west recently to reach Italy and Sardinia (Rosa & Soon 2012 ). As a consequence the presence in Mallorca should be a recent introduction. On the contrary we found
Ch. lanceolata
in Portugal (Oliveira et al. 2010 ) and Northwest Spain . Fifty-four individuals were captured by the Malaise traps operated by the Salamanca University since 1993 in the followings sites: Embalse de Saucelle (SA), 2001, 1 ex.; Vilaverde del Monte (Burgos) 2003, 6 exx.; Mieza el Carrascal (SA) 2004, 1 ex.; Santa Maria de Sando (SA), 2003, 1 ex.; Paredes de Escalona (ZA) 1999, 20 exx.; Portaje (Coria), 9 exx., 1999 ; Viana de Cega (VA), 2 exx., 1993 (González et al. 1998 ); Salto de Saucelles (SA), 1 ex., 1998 (González et al. 2000 ); Villarino de los Aires (SA), 2 exx. (Strumia et al. 2002 ), 1995 ; Herguijuela de la Sierra (SA), 2 exx., 2005 ; Valle Las Batuecas (SA), 1000 m , 5 exx. (Strumia et al. 2010 ), 2005 ; Sepulcro (SA), 4 exx., 2003 .
Chrysis lanceolata
demonstrating the widespread distribution in the Iberian Region.

Fenology.
1 .VI
, 1 ex.;

, 1 ex.

Distribution. Europa, Turley. Balearic Islands: Mallorca (Navás, 1910 ), cited as
Chrysis micans Rossi, 1790
, identified by du Buysson.

Note .
Chrysis sexdentata Christ 1791
erroneously synonymized with
Chrysis variegata Olivier 1791
. The latter is a junior synonym of
Euchroeus purpuratus (Fabricius 1787 )
.

Hedychrum spina Lepeletier
de Saint Fargeau 1806 : 121 .

var. vulgatus
